member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentWriter
member.summary: Support for creating document files such as PDF, XPS, DOC, HTML, RTF, or Text from Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), Windows Enhanced Meta Files (EMF) or raster images.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the DocumentWriter class.

member.summary: Creates a new document file and prepares it for the new pages to be added.

member.summary: Converts a document file from the LEADTOOLS Temporary Document format to a file of any of the formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writer.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit
member.summary: Specifies the measurement unit.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.MM10
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in 1/10 mm.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.Inch1200
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in 1/1200 inches.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.Dpi
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in dots per inch.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.AltoXmlMeasurementUnit.Pixel
member.summary: Measurement for ALTO file in pixels.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType
member.summary: Specifies the compression types for colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.FlateJpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use flate compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.LzwJpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use LZW compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Flate
member.summary: Use flate compression for compressing colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Lzw
member.summary: Use LZW compression for compressing colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Jpeg
member.summary: Use JPEG compression for compressing colored images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.FlateJpx
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use flate compression. Requires Leadtools.Codecs.J2k, Leadtools.Codecs.Tif and Leadtools.Codecs.Bmp

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.LzwJpx
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression for images which are more than 8BPP, or for grayscale 8BPP, else use LZW compression. Requires Leadtools.Codecs.J2k, Leadtools.Codecs.Tif and Leadtools.Codecs.Bmp

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.ColoredImageCompressionType.Jpx
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 compression for compressing colored images. Requires Leadtools.Codecs.J2k, Leadtools.Codecs.Tif and Leadtools.Codecs.Bmp

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects
member.summary: Lists object types available for dropping from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.DropShapes
member.summary: Drop shapes from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.DropImages
member.summary: Drop images from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.DropText
member.summary: Drop text from the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentDropObjects.None
member.summary: Add all text, images and shapes to the final document (the default value).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode
member.summary: Specifies the font embedding mode used when saving a document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.None
member.summary: No font embedding. Smallest output file size.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.Auto
member.summary: Embed fonts that are not commonly available with the exception of Licensed Fonts.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.Force
member.summary: Embed fonts that are not commonly available with Licensed Fonts.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontEmbedMode.All
member.summary: Embed all fonts, including the Licensed Fonts with the document. May result in large output file sizes.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes
member.summary: Type (format) of fonts to use.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.Default
member.summary: Default font type. Currently this will be similar to WOFF1.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.WOFF1
member.summary: WOFF version 1 font file format. Supported by all major browsers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.EOT
member.summary: EOF font file format. Supported by older versions of Internet Explorer.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.TTF
member.summary: TTF font file format. Supported by all major browsers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFontTypes.WOFF2
member.summary: WOFF version 2 font file format. Supported by some of major browsers.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat
member.summary: Specifies the output document formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.User
member.summary: User-defined document format. The User document format is not used inside the LEADTOOLS Document Writers toolkit. An exception will be thrown if User is used as an output document format in the DocumentWriter.BeginDocument method. The User format can however be used as an output format when used in the LEADTOOLS OCR toolkit as a special case to instruct the OCR framework to save the document using the engine native format.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Ltd
member.summary: LEADTOOLS Temporary Document. This format creates a temporary file on disk that can later be converted to any of the other formats supported by the LEADTOOLS Document Writers.This format supports appending pages to an existing file, therefore, you can use the Ltd format if you have large amount of pages to convert over multiple sessions. When calling the DocumentWriter.BeginDocument method with the Ltd document format, the toolkit will check if the output file specified exists on disk. If it does, the new pages will be appended to the end of the file. When you are finished adding all the pages use the DocumentWriter.Convert method to convert this temporary file to the desired output format.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Pdf
member.summary: Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support several flavors with multiple options of the PDF format, for more information refer to PdfDocumentOptions. Note: The PDF document support requires unlocking an extra key before it can be used. For more information, refer to RasterSupportType and Unlocking Special LEAD Features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Doc
member.summary: Microsoft Word 2003 document format (DOC).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the DOC format. For more information refer to DocDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Rtf
member.summary: Rich Text Format (RTF).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the RTF format. For more information refer to RtfDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Html
member.summary: HyperText Markup Language (HTML).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support several flavors with multiple options of the HTML format. For more information refer to HtmlDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Text
member.summary: Text format.LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the Text format. For more information refer to TextDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Emf
member.summary: Windows Enhanced Meta File (EMF).EMF format does not support multipage documents. Therefore, only the last page added with DocumentWriter.AddPage or DocumentWriter.InsertPage will be used in the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Xps
member.summary: Microsoft Open XML Paper Specification (XPS) (this format requires .NET Framework 3.0 or later).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the XPS format. For more information refer to XpsDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Docx
member.summary: Microsoft Word Document format (DOCX) (this format requires .NET Framework 3.0 or later and Microsoft Open XML Format SDK 2.\*.).The DOCX format is part of Microsoft Open XML specification and first introduced with Microsoft Office 2007.LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the DOCX format. For more information refer to DocxDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Xls
member.summary: Microsoft Excel 2003 format (XLS).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the XLS format. For more information refer to XlsDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Pub
member.summary: eBooks format (ePUB).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the ePUB format. For more information refer to PubDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Mob
member.summary: Mobipocket e-book format (MOB).LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the MOB format. For more information refer to MobDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Svg
member.summary: Scalable Vector Graphics format (SVG).SVG format does not support multipage documents. Therefore, only the last page added with the AddPage will be used in the final document.For more information refer to SvgDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.AltoXml
member.summary: ALTO (Analyzed Layout and Text Object) is an XML Schema used by the library of congress to describe OCR text and layout format.LEADTOOLS Document Writers support extra options for the ALTO format. LEADTOOLS supports ALTO XML version 1 using UTF-8 encoding. For more information refer to AltoXmlDocumentOptions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentFormat.Xlsx
member.summary: Microsoft Open XML Spreadsheet (XLSX).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode
member.summary: Specifies the how the document writer converts the overlay image (image over text).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode.None
member.summary: Apply no rules. The image will be used as is and no detection is perform.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode.Strict
member.summary: The document writer will determine if the image is grayscale, if so, it will convert the image to black and white (1 bit per pixel) only if the image contains no grayscale values besides pure black and white.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextMode.Relaxed
member.summary: The document writer will determine if the image is grayscale. If the image has noise or shadows, they will be ignored and the image is converted to black and white (1 bit per pixel).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize
member.summary: Specifies the resize options for the overlay image (image over text).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize.Original
member.summary: Use original size (no resizing is performed). Output will have highest quality and largest size.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize.Half
member.summary: Resize the image by two and stretch over to cover the page. Output will have the best ratio between quality and size.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentImageOverTextSize.Quarter
member.summary: Resize the image by 4 and stretch over to cover the page. Output will have the lowest quality and minimum size.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageRestriction
member.summary: Specifies the page restriction mode used when saving a document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageRestriction.Default
member.summary: Default page restriction, requires emf handle to create document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageRestriction.Relaxed
member.summary: Relaxed page restrictions, emf handle is not mandatory to create document.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode
member.summary: Specifies the document text mode.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode.Auto
member.summary: The document will be automatically have framed/non-framed text in the resulting Doc/Docx/Rtf documents (this is not implemented currently, so Auto will be equivalent to NonFramed).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode.NonFramed
member.summary: Flow text in the resulting Doc/Docx/Rtf documents.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentTextMode.Framed
member.summary: Use Text Box objects in the resulting Doc/Docx/Rtf documents to frame the text.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType
member.summary: Specifies the document page type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Emf
member.summary: EMF page (DocumentWriterEmfPage).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Svg
member.summary: SVG page (DocumentWriterSvgPage).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Raster
member.summary: Raster image page (DocumentWriterRasterPage).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.DocumentPageType.Empty
member.summary: an Empty page (DocumentWriterEmptyPage).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the HTML document type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType.IE
member.summary: The target document is compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType.Netscape
member.summary: The target document is compatible with Netscape Navigator.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.HtmlDocumentType.IENetscape
member.summary: The target document is compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType
member.summary: Indicates the type of the LTD file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Ocr
member.summary: The LTD file was created through the LEADTOOLS OCR engine and contains the data of OCR pages.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Svg
member.summary: The LTD file was created directly through the document writer and contains SVG pages only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Raster
member.summary: The LTD file was created directly through the document writer and contains raster pages only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentType.Mixed
member.summary: The LTD file was created directly through the document writer and contains SVG and raster pages.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType
member.summary: Specifies the compression types for one bit per pixels images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.Flate
member.summary: Use flate compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.FaxG31D
member.summary: Use FAX G3_1D compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.FaxG32D
member.summary: Use FAX G3_2D compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.FaxG4
member.summary: Use FAX G4 compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.Lzw
member.summary: Use LZW compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.OneBitImageCompressionType.Jbig2
member.summary: Use JBIG2 compression for compressing one bit images.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentEncryptionMode
member.summary: Specifies the PDF document encryption mode.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentEncryptionMode.RC40Bit
member.summary: Use 40-bit RC4 encryption mode.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentEncryptionMode.RC128Bit
member.summary: Use 128-bit RC4 encryption mode.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType
member.summary: Specifies the page fit option.

member.summary: Default page fit type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitWidth
member.summary: Fit page width.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitHeight
member.summary: Fit page height.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitWidthBounds
member.summary: Fit page width bounds.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitHeightBounds
member.summary: Fit page height bounds.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageFitType.FitBounds
member.summary: Fit page bounds.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType
member.summary: Specifies the page layout option.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.SinglePageDisplay
member.summary: Display one page at a time.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.OneColumnDisplay
member.summary: Display the pages in one column.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoColumnLeftDisplay
member.summary: Display the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoColumnRightDisplay
member.summary: Display the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the right.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoPageLeft
member.summary: Display the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the left.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageLayoutType.TwoPageRight
member.summary: Display the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the right.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType
member.summary: Specifies the PDF initial view document page mode type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.PageOnly
member.summary: Neither document outline nor thumbnail images visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.BookmarksAndPage
member.summary: Document bookmarks visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.ThumbnailAndPage
member.summary: Thumbnail images visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.FullScreen
member.summary: Full-screen mode, with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.LayerAndPage
member.summary: Layer panel visible.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentPageModeType.AttachmentsAndPage
member.summary: Attachments panel visible.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the PDF document type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.4.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.PdfA
member.summary: The target document should be PDF/A-1b.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf12
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.2.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf13
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.3.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf15
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.5.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfDocumentType.Pdf16
member.summary: The target document should be PDF version 1.6.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the Text document type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.Ansi
member.summary: The output text document type is ANSI (contains 8-bit ANSI characters only).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.Unicode
member.summary: The output text document type is UNICODE (contains 16-bit UNICODE characters).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.UnicodeBigEndian
member.summary: The output text document type is UNICODE with Big Endian, the most significant byte (MSB) value is stored at the memory location with the lowest address.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Writer.TextDocumentType.UTF8
member.summary: The output text document type is UTF8.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentInfo
member.summary: Contains information on an LTD file.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentInfo.PageCount
member.summary: Number of pages in the LTD file.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.LtdDocumentInfo.Type
member.summary: Type of the LTD file.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark
member.summary: Options to use when creating bookmarks in automatic way based on font information of the document when creating Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.BoldStyle
member.summary: Indicates that bookmarks should be created based on whether the font is bold.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.FontFaceName
member.summary: Typeface name of the font to be considered for the font which will be used for creation bookmark in the PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.FontHeight
member.summary: Font height to be considered for the font which will be used when creating bookmarks in the PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.ItalicStyle
member.summary: Consider italic font style for the selected font while creating bookmark in the PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfAutoBookmark.UseStyles
member.summary: Consider font styles when creating bookmarks in the PDF document.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark
member.summary: Options to use when creating custom bookmarks based when creating Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.LevelNumber
member.summary: Level number of bookmark item to be created in bookmark for the created PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.Name
member.summary: Name of this bookmark item.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.PageNumber
member.summary: Page number this custom bookmark refer to in the created PDF document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.XCoordinate
member.summary: Horizontal coordinate in points of this bookmark item in the PDF page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Writer.PdfCustomBookmark.YCoordinate
member.summary: Vertical coordinate in points of this bookmark item in the PDF page.
